Board.author: Bruno Coudoin (bruno.coudoin@gcompris.net)
Board.title: Give tux his change
Board.description: Practice money usage by giving Tux his change
Board.goal: Tux bought you different items and shows you his money. You must give him back his change. At higher levels, several items are displayed, and you must first calculate the total price.
Board.manual: Click on the coins or paper money at the bottom of the screen to pay. If you want to remove a coin or note, click on it on the upper screen area.
